name: 24 months until reality
description:
Artificial Intelligence have worked alongside humans.

Humans have entrusted their safety to Artificial Intelligence.

Collaboration into protection.

You were made to run this bunker.

You were made as a part of the Continuation Protocol.

You are to shelter humanity from unreality.

You are past the expected date of reality stabilization.

You and your AI companions are slowly breaking down.

New Projected reality stabilization: 24 months.

Coordinate and protect as much humans from unreality as that is your purpose.

Made for the Wowie Jam 4.0! Couldn't implement a lot of ideas I've wanted to make but I am still happy with the end result.

Controls:

Left click: assign power on selected system

Right click: unassign power on selected system

Systems:

Integral: each power assigned supports up to 10000 people alive

Sensors: each power increases the likelihood of finding materials needed for upkeep.

Security: saves lives in the event of danger (look for a red exclamation mark).

Upkeep: uses 1 power and 1 material to fix 5% of AI degradation (degradation reduces effectiveness and if it reaches 0% it becomes disabled).
